# Government Tender Announcement: Passenger-Operated Cableway Rebuild at Hydro-Metric Monitoring Station, Oldman River near the Mouth Alberta

## Table of Contents

* Tender Details
* Project Overview
* Construction Requirements
* Important Dates
* Contact Information

## Tender Details

*   Solicitation Number: 5000061972
*   Procurement Category: CNST
*   Notice Type: Request for Proposal
*   Procurement Method: Competitive - Limited Tendering
*   Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Regions of Opportunity: Canada
*   Regions of Delivery: Alberta

## Project Overview

The Government of Canada, through Environment Canada, is seeking a contractor to rebuild a passenger-operated cableway at the Hydro-Metric Monitoring Station, located near the old man river's mouth in Alberta. The scope of work includes planning, construction, and completion of the new cableway in a timely manner, ensuring minimal environmental impact. The project is estimated to take approximately 15 business days to complete and is expected to be finished by October 28, 2022.

## Construction Requirements

The contractor is responsible for managing all construction activities in accordance with relevant guidelines and standards. This includes careful planning and execution to minimize environmental impact. The construction team must ensure the successful installation of the new cableway that meets specifications and provides a continuous production of discharge data.

## Important Dates

*   Tender Closing Date: September 20, 2022, at 18:00
*   Amendment Date: September 14, 2022
*   Expected Contract Start Date: To be determined
*   Expected Contract End Date: To be determined

## Contact Information

*   Contact Name: Helena Lee
*   Email: [Helena.Lee@ec.gc.ca](mailto:Helena.Lee@ec.gc.ca)
*   Additional Information can be found in the attached documents. 

## Legal and Delivery Description

This contract is subject to the provisions of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and is for the purpose of delivering the works for a passenger-operated cableway at the Oldman River near the mouth in Alberta.

More information is available in the tender documents including:

*   Invitation to Tender Document
*   Part A-Statement of Work
*   Part B-Construction Specifications
*   Part C - Drawing Package

Note - This contract is no longer active, and no additional proposals will be accepted 23.1 since the deadline has passed.
